resources.string: By using Pothole Patrol, you agree to the following:Services: Users can report potholes with photos and GPS location to relevant authorities.User Responsibilities: Do not submit false information or illegal content.Personal Data: We collect personal info, location, and media solely for processing reports. Data may be shared with municipal services.Liability: We are not responsible for delays or unresolved reports.Updates: Terms may change, and continued use implies acceptance.
